name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Van Curt OLVERSON, Petitioner

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Van Curt OLVERSON, Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 19th day of January, 1988, the petition for allowance of appeal is hereby quashed. See, 42 Pa.C.S. § 9781(f).
LARSEN and McDERMOTT, JJ., dissent.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
536 A.2d 337
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Van Curt OLVERSON, Petitioner.
No. 641 W.D. Allocatur Docket 1986.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Jan. 19, 1988.
